item.text: What shall we say then? Are we to remain in sin so that grace may increase?

<st data-num="1096" class="">Absolutely</st> <st data-num="3361" class="">not</st>! <st data-num="4459" class="">How</st> can we <st data-num="3748" class="">who</st> <st data-num="599" class="">died</st> to <st data-num="266" class="">sin</st> <st data-num="2089" class="">still</st> <st data-num="2198" class="">live</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="846" class="">it</st>?

<st data-num="2228" class="">Or</st> do you <st data-num="50">not know</st> <st data-num="3754" class="">that</st> <st data-num="3745">as many as</st> were <st data-num="907" class="">baptized</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">into</st> <st data-num="5547" class="">Christ</st> <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> were <st data-num="907" class="">baptized</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">into</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="2288" class="">death</st>?
Therefore we have been buried with him through baptism into death, in order that just as Christ was raised from the dead through the glory of the Father, so we too may live a new life.
For if we have become united with him in the likeness of his death, we will certainly also be united in the likeness of his resurrection.

We <st data-num="1097" class="">know</st> <st data-num="3754">that</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1473" class="">our</st> <st data-num="3820" class="">old</st> <st data-num="444" class="">man</st> was <st data-num="4957">crucified with</st> him <st data-num="2443" class="">so that</st> the <st data-num="4983" class="">body</st> of <st data-num="266" class="">sin</st> would <st data-num="3371" class="">no longer</st> <st data-num="2673">dominate</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">us</st>,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="2443" class="">so that</st> we would <st data-num="3371" class="">no longer</st> be <st data-num="1398" class="">enslaved</st> to <st data-num="266" class="">sin</st>.
(For someone who has died has been freed from sin.)
Now if we died with Christ, we believe that we will also live with him.

We <st data-num="1492" class="">know</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="3754" class="">that</st> since <st data-num="5547" class="">Christ</st> has been <st data-num="1453" class="">raised</st> <st data-num="1537" class="">from</st> the <st data-num="3498" class="">dead</st>, he is <st data-num="3765" class="">never</st> going to <st data-num="599" class="">die</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="3765" class="">again</st>; <st data-num="2288" class="">death</st> <st data-num="3765">no longer</st> has <st data-num="2961" class="">mastery</st> over <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>.

<st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> the <st data-num="3739">death</st> he <st data-num="599" class="">died</st>, he <st data-num="599" class="">died</st> to <st data-num="266" class="">sin</st> <st data-num="2178">once for all</st>, <st data-num="1161" class="">but</st> the <st data-num="3739">life</st> he <st data-num="2198" class="">lives</st>, he <st data-num="2198" class="">lives</st> to <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st>.
So you too consider yourselves dead to sin, but alive to God in Christ Jesus.
Therefore do not let sin reign in your mortal body so that you obey its desires,

<st data-num="3366">and</st> do <st data-num="3366" class="">not</st> <st data-num="3936" class="">present</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="3196" class="">members</st> to <st data-num="266" class="">sin</st> as <st data-num="3696" class="">instruments</st><n id="1" /> to be used for <st data-num="93" class="">unrighteousness</st>,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="235" class="">but</st> <st data-num="3936" class="">present</st> <st data-num="1438" class="">yourselves</st> to <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st> <st data-num="5616" class="">as</st> those who are <st data-num="2198" class="">alive</st> <st data-num="1537" class="">from</st> the <st data-num="3498" class="">dead</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="3196" class="">members</st> to <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st> as <st data-num="3696" class="">instruments</st><n id="3" /> to be used for <st data-num="1343" class="">righteousness</st>.
For sin will have no mastery over you, because you are not under law but under grace.
What then? Shall we sin because we are not under law but under grace? Absolutely not!

Do you <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> <st data-num="1492" class="">know</st> <st data-num="3754" class="">that</st> if you <st data-num="3936" class="">present</st> <st data-num="1438" class="">yourselves</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1519" class="">as</st> <st data-num="5218" class="">obedient</st> <st data-num="1401" class="">slaves</st>,<n id="2" /> you <st data-num="1510" class="">are</st> <st data-num="1401" class="">slaves</st> of <st data-num="3739">the one</st> <st data-num="1492" class="">you</st> <st data-num="5219" class="">obey</st>, <st data-num="2273" class="">either</st> of <st data-num="266" class="">sin</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">resulting in</st> <st data-num="2288" class="">death</st>, <st data-num="2228" class="">or</st> <st data-num="5218" class="">obedience</st> <st data-num="1519">resulting in</st> <st data-num="1343" class="">righteousness</st>?<n id="3" />

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> <st data-num="5485" class="">thanks</st> be to <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st> <st data-num="3754" class="">that</st> though you <st data-num="1510" class="">were</st> <st data-num="1401" class="">slaves</st> to <st data-num="266" class="">sin</st>, you <st data-num="5219" class="">obeyed</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1537" class="">from</st> the <st data-num="2588" class="">heart</st> <st data-num="3739" class="">that</st> <st data-num="5179" class="">pattern</st><n id="2" /> of <st data-num="1322" class="">teaching</st> you were <st data-num="3860" class="">entrusted</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">to</st>,

<st data-num="1161" class="">and</st> having been <st data-num="1659" class="">freed</st> <st data-num="575" class="">from</st> <st data-num="266" class="">sin</st>, you became <st data-num="1402" class="">enslaved</st> to <st data-num="1343" class="">righteousness</st>.

(I am <st data-num="3004" class="">speaking</st> in <st data-num="442">human terms</st> <st data-num="1223" class="">because of</st> the <st data-num="769" class="">weakness</st> of <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="4561">flesh</st>.)<n id="1" /> <st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> <st data-num="5618">just as</st> you once <st data-num="3936" class="">presented</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="3196" class="">members</st> as <st data-num="1401" class="">slaves</st> to <st data-num="167" class="">impurity</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="458" class="">lawlessness</st> leading <st data-num="1519" class="">to</st> more <st data-num="458" class="">lawlessness</st>, <st data-num="3779" class="">so</st> <st data-num="3568" class="">now</st> <st data-num="3936" class="">present</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="3196" class="">members</st> as <st data-num="1401" class="">slaves</st> to <st data-num="1343" class="">righteousness</st> leading <st data-num="1519" class="">to</st> <st data-num="38" class="">sanctification</st>.
For when you were slaves of sin, you were free with regard to righteousness.
So what benefit did you then reap from those things that you are now ashamed of? For the end of those things is death.

<st data-num="1161" class="">But</st> <st data-num="3570" class="">now</st>, <st data-num="1659" class="">freed</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="575" class="">from</st> <st data-num="266" class="">sin</st> <st data-num="1161" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1402" class="">enslaved</st> to <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st>, you <st data-num="2192" class="">have</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="2590" class="">benefit</st><n id="2" /> leading <st data-num="1519" class="">to</st> <st data-num="38" class="">sanctification</st>, <st data-num="1161" class="">and</st> the <st data-num="5056" class="">end</st> is <st data-num="166" class="">eternal</st> <st data-num="2222" class="">life</st>.
For the payoff of sin is death, but the gift of God is eternal life in Christ Jesus our Lord.
